channel.title: [PI]one use only
channel.description:
OK i'm not sure how to do this but, I need something where they can only click it once, and if they try again it just gives them something else like 1gp.
So say for exmaple my donators would get free like...idk a santa, how could I make it where they can only click that button once in the quest tab, and if they click it again they will get just 1gp so they cant spam click and get a load of the santa's?
EDIT: what im trying to say is that, if they go in the quest tab and there is an option that says "Free santa" they can click it and get the santa. But if they click it again they don't get a santa, just 1gp, or anything other than a santa, so they can't get millions of them by just spam clicking.

item.title: [PI]one use only

it works now! thank you!!

item.title: [PI]one use only
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

playersave:

} else if (token.equals("donatorChest")) { p.donatorChest = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("donatorChest = ", 0, 15); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donatorChest), 0, Integer.toString(p.donatorChest).length());

player:

actionhandler:

[code] case 104:
if (c.memberStatus == 1 && c.donatorChest == 2) {
c.sendMessage(“There is appears to be nothing inside.”);

		} else if (c.memberStatus == 1 && c.donatorChest == 0 || c.donatorChest == 1) {
				c.getItems().addItem(donatorRitem(),Misc.random(1));
				c.getItems().addItem(donatorRitem2(),Misc.random(1));
				c.getItems().addItem(995,Misc.random(10000000));
				c.donatorChest = 2;					
				
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("This is a donator only chest.");
		}[/code]

and

[code]case 104:
if (c.memberStatus == 1 && c.donatorChest == 0) {
c.getItems().addItem(donatorRitem(),Misc.random(1));
c.getItems().addItem(donatorRitem2(),Misc.random(1));
c.getItems().addItem(995,Misc.random(10000000));
c.donatorChest = 1;
} else if (c.memberStatus == 1 && c.donatorChest == 1) {
c.sendMessage(“There is appears to be nothing inside.”);

			} else {
				c.sendMessage("This is a donator only chest.");
			}
		break;[/code]

Your topic is too unclear.

Put us readers in the “mood”. Give us an idea what the topic is all about before randomly stating a problem or such.

Good luck.
